metadata.title: CVE-2020-18773 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An invalid memory access in the decode function in iptc.cpp of Exiv20.27.99.0 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via a craftedtif file.

criterions.comment: exiv2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
